dc.contributor.author: Lange, I
Perry, C
dc.description.abstract: This is the dataset used for the Lange et al. (2020) article "A quick, easy and non-invasive method to quantify coral growth rates using photogrammetry and 3D model comparisons" published in Methods in Ecology & Evolution.
dc.title: A quick, easy and non-invasive method to quantify coral growth rates using photogrammetry and 3D model comparisons (dataset)
dc.description: Details of 3D models, precision analysis and measured annual coral growth rates as .xlsx file with 4 data sheets
The article associated with this dataset is located in ORE at: http://hdl.handle.net/10871/120160
